website_summaries.verdict: Top quality and easy assembly. Though it's a bit pricey, you won't find a better choice on almost every front.
pros: Its sturdy wood frame, durable build, and soft padded head/foot boards earn it top marks
It's easy to put together (tools included) and looks adorable
cons: Expensive, but it has a lot to offer in the way of looks, functionality, and craftsmanship

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves her new bed!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love how this bed looks... Headboard very comfortable!... I'm tempted (As the dad) to sleep in this thing lol!... Great purchase me, and the wife very happy about our purchase!...
customer_reviews.author: RebLess

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is obsessed with being a princess. We looked at numerous styles of toddler beds m, hoping to find a “princess” bed that was sturdy. I came across this one and was sold. I assembled it myself in about an hour. She was so excited to not only have a big girl bed, but a big girl “princess” bed. It’s perfect height for my 2 year old and looks so classy
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Moss

customer_reviews.title: Nice bed. My 18 mo old daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: Nice bed. My 18 mo old daughter loves it. Quality not the greatest but what is good quality these days. Disappointed that the mattress did not fit with tufted headboard facing inward. Now the tufted side of the headboard faces the wall. After reading some other reviews, seems to be more of an issue with the mattresses. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: rob

customer_reviews.title: Super cute toddler bed and great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Super cute toddler bed and great customer service. The bed that we first received had a crack in the headboard. You couldn’t notice it much, but we didn’t want it to be a bigger problem down the road, so we emailed the company, sent pictures of the crack, and within a couple of days received a new headboard. Also, the assembly instructions tell you to put the gems facing out on the head and the foot of the bed, but the picture shows the gems facing in. It works fine both ways, but looks better when you can actually see them.
customer_reviews.author: Miles' mom

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly, worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bed for my two year old daughter. Directions are very basic and eady to follow, all the parts were easy to identify. It took me probably about 30-40 mins total. My daughter LOVES her bed. She enjoys getting in and out on her own. She willingly slept in it the first night, i have to lay with her for her to sleep. She's about 25lbs and I'm about 115lbs so a total of 140lbs and there was no cracking sounds or bending going on lol. (Probably shouldn't be laying in a toddler bed). Regardless, it is strudy and beautiful! Love how big the jewels are and how soft the head and foot boards are!
customer_reviews.author: T Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality!!!
customer_reviews.text: Way better quality then I thought! The price was such a great deal for this bed! My toddler absolutely loved it and so did i! It's gorgeous! Only thing I wish they would of sent was covers for the screws n bolts. But was super easy to put together. Did it myself in about 20 min at most and only took me that long cause my almost two year old was trying to "help" the entire time lol. But she adores it and before this, she refused to sleep in her convertible crib bed! But the look of this bed is everything I could of hoped for and more!
customer_reviews.author: littledff

customer_reviews.title: Love this elegant bed
customer_reviews.text: I love this toddler bed, the headboard design is so elegant. I assembled them myself Im the mom, takes a little longer because my little girl wanted to help. It’s her First night to sleep on her bed tonight and she’s so excited, took all her stuff minnies and other toys and put them beside her. I Put a memory foam mattress, minnie mouse bed sheets and she is one happy, comfy girl.
customer_reviews.author: Miki Me

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: REALLY cute I love it! The color and everything is super nice looks just like in photos, my LO is 2y/o and she loved jumping, so far the bed has been sturdy enough to handle her
customer_reviews.author: AnonymousC

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bed!
customer_reviews.text: I got this bed for my daughter about a month ago and absolutely love it so far. Before I purchased this we were co-sleeping and her first night sleeping in this bed she had no issues sleeping through the night. My only complaint is I wish it was a little bit longer. I put it together on my own and it took me a little less than 2 hours (I’m not “handy” at all and the self drilling screws confused me lol) but it was relatively easy.
customer_reviews.author: DeJanay Lee

customer_reviews.title: good product but missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: this toddler bed was super cute i fell in love with it as soon as i opened the box, looks just as it is described and pictured. Only downfall is that it was missing pieces for the base so i had to return it ):
customer_reviews.author: Chante'

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous bed, fit for a princess!!
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely adore this bed!! It is so freakin' cute and just right for a little lady. I loved the pictures and love it even more in person. It was easy to assemble and my daughter had no issues transitioning. The rails are just enough to keep her in the bed, especially on those nights where she likes to move around wildly. This was well worth the money, adds the right about of charm to her room. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: T. Woodard

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but small
customer_reviews.text: I got so excited when I saw this bed and was very happy to buy it, but once received and I took it out for assembly it looked very little, smaller then the crib we’ve used before. With a broken heart i had to return it and shop for a twin bed. Return was easy with step by step instructions. Would definitely buy this bed if it would come in twin size.
customer_reviews.author: vere*****

customer_reviews.title: The cutest bed ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: Sooo beautiful! So I bought this bed for m 5 year old and honestly she has another year in this bed before she gets too big. I loveeee it! Since she doesn’t like sleeping alone in her room but is a wild sleeper this was the perfect bed to put in my room so that she can be next to me but not kicking me in my sleep lol. I put it together myself in less than a hour and we both loveeeeeeee it!
customer_reviews.author: Tee

customer_reviews.title: Super adorable bed,we love love it! Definitely a great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This bed is adorable, my daughter loves it and so do I. It was missing a jewel, and it rubs a little bit getting the mattress in and out on the headboard but a very solid bed , and my daughter loves it, I would definitely buy this again out of 4 kids this bed has been my favorite! And husband put it together really quickly.
customer_reviews.author: kaysie konnoff

customer_reviews.title: Such a cute little bed!
customer_reviews.text: This bed is adorable! My daughter’s crib looked like it was getting too small, but even with this bed using the same mattress it just seems like she has so much more room! The instructions were easy enough, I’ve had worst before. It seems very sturdy. I am kind of small myself but I can lay on the bed with her and it feels fine! Cute bed and I’m very happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great value for this absolutely beautiful toddler bed
customer_reviews.text: We initially had an issue with this bed because the box contained 2 of the same bed rail. However I contacted the Orbelle company directly and they overnight shipped us the missing piece! For this reason I would give their customer service a 5, but have removed 1 star for the mistake occurring in the first place and their need for better quality control. The bed itself is ADORABLE!! For the price I would definitely recommend this item and it fit perfectly with our fancy Paris girl room theme.
customer_reviews.author: Heather01234

customer_reviews.title: That being said its the perfect intermediate step between crib and full twin bed
customer_reviews.text: The bed is small, uses a crib mattress... So don't think its a twin. That being said its the perfect intermediate step between crib and full twin bed. We like it because its small enough for a two year old to get in. Recommend... The parts seem small and flimsy, until it all bolts up. Then its solid.
customer_reviews.author: Denis B. Yunin

customer_reviews.title: Amazing toddle bed
customer_reviews.text: My daughter love sleeping in her bed. It looks amazing, even my other daughter that's 18 months gets on n off on her own so think of having matching bed by they end of the yr. The only issue I had was when I was assembling they skipped a part in the beginning, it didn't state I had to screw in the metal part n make individual hole. It should have explained n have guidance me by x marks or something. That's the only reason if not it would have gotten full 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Mayra

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed when I received this bed. When putting it together I noticed that the bed wasn’t constructed like the instructions. There were two holes completely missing. The bed materials aren’t sturdy or of good quality. It not something I would of let my child sleep in.
customer_reviews.author: TELISSA

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter absolutely loves her bed!!! it was a little bit confusing putting together (as you have to drill holes yourself and they are not pre-made for all holes) BUT once done, it fit perfect in the room.
customer_reviews.author: Lidhanesys Caraballo

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This bed is beautiful, sturdy, and exactly what I was looking for. We have had it for 2 months now and it has held up to adults laying on it kids jumping on it, dogs sneaking on it. To top it off, customer service is AMAZING. The footboard I received had a little chip on it. I notified customer service and was immediately messaged back with note that they are sending me a new footboard right away. I received it quickly and it’s perfect!
customer_reviews.author: EM

customer_reviews.title: Love it so far!
customer_reviews.text: It’s beautiful, we don’t allow any adults to sit on it, we don’t allow our daughter to jump on it so we don’t know whether it is great quality but it’s been a few months and we have no issues except how she bumps her face at night on the side rails but we try to block them with balled up blankets now. Great bead so far. I recommend it! It’s just so nice to look at too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to assemble
customer_reviews.text: The pieces do not fit together as they should. The screws don’t fit in the holes and when they do they are going in crooked. Would give zero stars if it were an option. I only hope we are able to get the pieces back in the box to send it back for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Choke hazard!! Rhinestone fell off
customer_reviews.text: Rhinestone fell off before assembly. Choke hazard, not ok. Overall well made, would’ve given 5 stars were it not for having zero peace of mind that other rhinestones won’t fall off or be taken off by child and swallowed. They should be permanently secured or not placed in the headboard and footboard at all. Safety over beauty!
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Heck

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Very well-made very well put together solid and can hold quite a bit of weight side rails are nice so are toddler doesn't roll off only thing that was wrong on our order was a jewel on the toe board was missing just one even with that I would still give it a 5-star rating because of the quality
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Add a twin size!
customer_reviews.text: PLEASE MAKE THIS IN A TWIN SIZE TOO!!! We have had this for over a year and love it. Now my little needs a twin bed and I want this same one!!!! Pleaseeeee come out with it!
customer_reviews.author: Scooter

customer_reviews.title: Not a sturdy product
customer_reviews.text: not a good product at all for some reason the frame was tight in the middle and lose on the end joints and the wood keep coming off
customer_reviews.author: Faizan

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful princess bed!
customer_reviews.text: Beauty and quality! This bed was easy to assemble, though it came without instructions, it was mostly obvious. We found instructions online. It is perfectly made - truly beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Sm

customer_reviews.title: Missing screws, no predrilled holes
customer_reviews.text: This bed is very cute, but came missing one of the screws. Also the directions say if there is a missing part to email the company within 10 days, and as a busy mom I was not able to get to it right away. I had to put it together with the screw missing and I don’t love that. Also the holes are not all predrilled, and That caused issues with the alignment of the plates. Overall I don’t think I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Great Toddler Bed that doesnt break the bank
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our 18 month old daughter and she loved it! Durable, looks great and nice and low to the ground. Would def purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonJunkie

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and cute
customer_reviews.text: Such a cute bed! It’s actually sturdy. The tufted head and footboards are nicely made, soft fabric yet sturdy for my little girl. Makes a nice touch to her room.
customer_reviews.author: WMF

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous Toddler Bed with BEDazzle.
customer_reviews.text: This toddler bed is gorgeous and great quality. I purchased for my 17 month old so she can have a bed that she can grow with. It was easy to assemble (according to hubby) and it does not have that kiddie character look. I am pleased with this purchase and would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: G8terJazz

customer_reviews.title: One of the best toddler beds I've ever seen all my friends compliment ...
customer_reviews.text: One of the best toddler beds I've ever seen all my friends compliment it. My toddler jumps on her bed all the time it's super sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We love it
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bed. You have to take the mattress completely off to get the fitted sheet on because of the tufted padding on the headboard.
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Cutest bed ever!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 2 year old granddaughter - it is the perfect size and Absolutely the cutest bed ever. She absolutely loves her big girl bed - a perfect transition. Bed is sturdy, well made, good materials. The tufting even has crystals which I didn’t notice when I ordered it!
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Blair

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Pretty
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, very cute, was difficult for one person to assemble but not impossible. I also switched the headboard so the pretty pattering faces inward. Fits and I think it looks better.
customer_reviews.author: PBW

customer_reviews.title: adorable
customer_reviews.text: I put it together by myself in about 40 mins... with my toddler climbing on top of me. Super duper cute. Looks great for the price as well.
customer_reviews.author: TeganWilkin

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but so many problems to put it together!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! but so many problems to put it together! Starting off that it didn’t even come with the manual. Parts weren’t done property to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Lisy

customer_reviews.title: It’s a crib size bed. Not great material
customer_reviews.text: It’s a very cute design but a few screws were missing and when you tighten the screws your can hear the bed cracking and the screw isn’t even all the way in. The crib size mattress has to be shoved into the bed to fit. It’s a nice design but poor material.
customer_reviews.author: Erika Perez

customer_reviews.title: Good quality,good price and best of all easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality easy to assemble. My daughter loves it . Low to the ground so she can climb on easily, bow she take napa when she tired on her own. Would defenetly buy again.
customer_reviews.author: jose lopez

customer_reviews.title: NOT SAFE, POORLY MADE
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this bed, it is extremely unsafe for my toddler. The bed itself is cute but not practical. The top of the bed is not secure and shakes under any weight and pressure. The base is made of a bunch of loose boards that pop out all the time. I reached out to the company with my concerns and I have not heard a word back. Extremely disappointed... total rip off!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: New toddler bed broke
customer_reviews.text: As soon as the small 3 year old sat on bed it broke. The wood is either rotten or not strong enough for a 2-3 year old — and she is small. I want refund.
customer_reviews.author: Caramella

customer_reviews.title: Cute bed
customer_reviews.text: This bed was very easy to assemble (did it all by myself) and it comes with the tools you need, nothing was messed up or missing. When I got it all put together it was sooo cute and very sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bed!
customer_reviews.text: This bed is absolutely PERFECT!!!! It is just as beautiful as the picture shows. Wayfair was $3 less but I got this in 2 days (delivered on a Sunday even!!!!) And it was free shipping with prime. More than worth the extra $3! Wayfair was quoting 3+ weeks for delivery!! It is absolutely beautiful ... Even better than pictured in person!
customer_reviews.author: Niki Kaminski

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't ask for more
customer_reviews.text: This beds quality is great, very sturdy and love everything on it
customer_reviews.author: Yamileth

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I put this together by myself with ease and it is absolutely beautiful even better looking in person rather then pictures and very sturdy it was worth it , I recommend a hundred and ten percent!
customer_reviews.author: Jillian

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: my grandkids love this bed and its pretty sturdy too!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Pottorff

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.text: Took my husband 30 minutes to assemble. It’s adorable and My toddler loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This toddler bed is beautiful! No chemical smell!!! Would recommend! My daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and great quality
customer_reviews.text: We got this bed for our 2 year old daughter and from the very first night she has loved it. Every night she runs in her room and gets in her bed without a struggle. The bed is a great value and very well made. It is adorable.
customer_reviews.author: jkoch

customer_reviews.title: The cutest bed ever
customer_reviews.text: This bed is just perfect! It can’t get any cuter than this. My daughter absolutely loves it, and I (her mother) assembled it myself and it took a little over an hour. Side note: everything pictured except for the wall rack was purchased on Amazon!!
customer_reviews.author: tiffanie dunschee

customer_reviews.title: Kind of cheaply made but ultimately I really love this for the look of my daughter's room
customer_reviews.text: Kind of cheaply made but ultimately I really love this for the look of my daughter's room. Our mattress is rather thick so we don't get the full effect of the headboard :-( but overall I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly H.

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: This bed was delivered earlier than expected and was even better quality than I expected. The wooden part of the bed is solid and sturdy. The padded part of the bed is a very nice soft material with gorgeous crystal buttons. I am extremely happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: vanessa p

customer_reviews.title: WORTH YOUR PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and worth the money, I’ve literally passed out on this bed with my daughter and I’m 170 lbs 5’6!! N it’s still in tact! No lose anything and I purchased this bed a year ago!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rosemarie

customer_reviews.title: Hard to put together
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bed but extremely difficult to put together, particularly the slats under the mattress!
customer_reviews.author: Erin B.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Two year old and she was so excited to see it. putting it together was easy a little long since we used a knife for screws we didn't have a screw driver and didn't want to wait. But her new room is so complete and she feels like a big girl.
customer_reviews.author: Sky

customer_reviews.title: Prefect
customer_reviews.text: Best Buy. I was happy yet sad my toddler wouldn’t be on my bed anymore
customer_reviews.author: Tmill90

customer_reviews.title: It’s acreally nice bed for boys as well
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his bed, it’s a really nice bed for boys as well his, is Grey. Very tasteful, elegant
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine

customer_reviews.title: Hello
customer_reviews.text: In love overall with the bed very good quality for the prices and soo adorbale! The most important part is my baby girl loved it as soon as she seen it she was so happy ♥️
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, good quality, easy assembly!
customer_reviews.text: I 100% recommend this toddler bed. Our daughter is almost 2 1/2 and it’s perfect for her (even younger kids too). Low to the ground, easy assembly, tufted headboard and footboard are beautiful, and fits the mattress from her crib perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful great quality beds
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these beds for my 3 year old twins. They are beautiful and I haven’t had any problems with them. They were easy to assemble and they are great quality. I’m very happy with this purchase and my girls love them!!!
customer_reviews.author: KimC

customer_reviews.title: Happy little girl.
customer_reviews.text: Very good for the money. Its was easy to put together. Are granddaughter LOVED her new first bed. She shows everyone her new bed that she gotten from her grandparents.
customer_reviews.author: Stan Liddell

customer_reviews.title: Orbelle
customer_reviews.text: Really really cute bed! Only negative thing I have to say is when putting the bed together you have to create your own holes for the screws which took up a lot of time. Other than that super great buy.
customer_reviews.author: M M

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: Adorable bed. Sturdy and looks much better than a typical toddler bed
customer_reviews.author: Lee Brown

customer_reviews.title: Beautifull bed my daughter loved it mine came with a stained headboard but they ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautifull bed my daughter loved it mine came with a stained headboard but they were amazing and responded quickly and resolved the issue
customer_reviews.author: Amir

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our little one's first bed from the crib. Suggestions to manufacture would be pre-drill holes so self-tapping screws go in easier. Also would be nice to have the bolts in silver color (minors issues)
customer_reviews.author: Anne Jelliff

customer_reviews.title: A bed for a Princess
customer_reviews.text: This bed is so cute. We got this for our 17 month old and she loves it. It took my husband and friend about an hour to put it together. I would definitely recommend this bed if you want to make your baby feel like a little Princess. Well worth the buy.
customer_reviews.author: E Wright

customer_reviews.title: A bit of a pain to put together. Mostly ...
customer_reviews.text: A bit of a pain to put together. Mostly because the slats wouldn't stay in place while trying to screw the pieces together. You also have to create your own holes in some spots. Especially where you connect the leg posts to the outter frame of the bed.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: So cute! Easy to put together and works perfectly! Great service!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: So cute!!
customer_reviews.text: This bed is so cute and works as it should
customer_reviews.author: HTB

customer_reviews.title: SO CUTE
customer_reviews.text: I love this! It's the perfect addition to my daughter's princess room! I had a plastic pne before and this one is much better quality for the price! Not to mention so much cuter.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Fischer

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: So adorable! I love this bed and it looks so cute in my daughters room. Arrived quick and relatively easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Lbz123

customer_reviews.title: They are very good
customer_reviews.text: I loved them. They are stylish and perfect for my babies.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: I love it so far
customer_reviews.text: I love it so far. The downside is that I struggled with putting it together but I think that was mainly from my little experience in assembling things. I hadn't used it yet but if all goes well then It'll definitely be a bed I'd recommend
customer_reviews.author: Heaven

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great bed for my 2 almost 3 yr old daughter. Very sturdy and looks great. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Stella Holland

customer_reviews.title: Perfect toddler bed for the price
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was hard. One side would not line up . But the sweat and tears was worth it. My grand baby loves it. He is 1 yrs old . I bought the memory foam mattress for it . Fits perfect and not to firm and not to soft.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, easy to put together.
customer_reviews.text: Built this bed the day it arrived. Easy instructions, My daughter loves it, slept in it the first night no fuss. Would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Louie V

customer_reviews.title: Cute, simple set up, & sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Simple assembly for those who aren’t so handy and it’s very sturdy. Holds at least 200lbs.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Bed!
customer_reviews.text: I put this together myself in under an hour and my three year old daughter LOVES it. It is so pretty and great quality. I Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JRstar

customer_reviews.title: My toddler loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 2y old for her birthday and she loves it! It’s so adorable. It took about an hour to assemble but for someone who knows what they’re doing probably half the time. I also love how durable it’s been. I’m able to lay with her and it’s a combined weight of 145#
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bed is good for kids to sleep, not for play or jump. Good quality for the price. Exactly as described.
customer_reviews.author: Elliztar

customer_reviews.title: Heads Up
customer_reviews.text: This bed is the size of a crib. My 20 month Grandaughter was too big for it.
customer_reviews.author: Susie C.

customer_reviews.title: Great style!
customer_reviews.text: I don't see this bed lasting long especially with a jumping toddler...But its a cute design and thats mainly why I purchased it. The price is great too!
customer_reviews.author: Sheree

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I liked the sturdiness for the price. I ordered one for my 4-year-old and she loved it, so I ordered a second for my 21-month-old.
customer_reviews.author: Crisol Mariscal

customer_reviews.title: Cute toddler bed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 2 year old and we love it! I thought it was a little pricey but definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Yari

customer_reviews.title: Princess bed
customer_reviews.text: My daughter being almost 18 months loves this so much!! She got this for her Christmas present from her Grammy and loves it !!!
customer_reviews.author: jamie wilkins

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality bed for the price!!! I am very happy with this product and it is a good investment.
customer_reviews.author: Diamond

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely BEST 👸  Toddler Bed!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the toddler bed! So classy! Makes my 2yr old daughter feel like a princess. I bought for her 2nd birthday present. I bought my oldest daughter a similar queen size bed so it matched perfectly for the theme.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Santana

customer_reviews.title: So gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so in love with this bed!!! Everyone that sees it ask me where I got it from! I love it all looks great with my babies room decor . Super pretty!
customer_reviews.author: Nayeli

customer_reviews.title: Good Product !
customer_reviews.text: This toddler bed was easy to assemble ! Looks just like the picture and I feel like it’s worth the money !
customer_reviews.author: La-Reishia Jackson

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: Super cute perfect for that transition bed from crib to bed
customer_reviews.author: Dianaluka12

customer_reviews.title: Cute toddler girl bed
customer_reviews.text: Adorable toddler bed. Good price. My granddaughter loves her bed. Not hard to put together, but getting the wood slats to stay in place while putting the frame together was a "true bonding moment" for Grandpa & Grandma. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves her new bed. Very cute assembly was a little difficult due to a screw head not fitting the hex key
customer_reviews.author: mbh

customer_reviews.title: Love this bed
customer_reviews.text: Love this bed for my 20 month old! It’s so cute and elegant. It’s super sturdy and doesn’t take long to assemble. This was a great purchase as a transition bed!
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Nice and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: My Daughter loves her bed she moved from a crib!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony J. Lara

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Tufted Toddler Bed
customer_reviews.text: This bed is really nice! It looks great in my daughter's room. My 3 yr old loves it,it matches the beds that her older sisters have. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Cyber Shopper

customer_reviews.title: I wish all the little princess could have this bed, all deserve it!
customer_reviews.text: This bed is everything I could have hoped for! It’s gorgeous easy to assemble and showed up three days ahead of schedule.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Adorable and my daughter loves it. There were a few dents upon arrival but not enough to return it. Pretty simple to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Sims

customer_reviews.title: Toddler bed
customer_reviews.text: Did not like that it was missing an allen head bolt it said it came with 14 but i counted 13 only when i set it up it was missing that last one
customer_reviews.author: Erica Delgado

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality, and easy to follow directions
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality, and easy to follow directions. Only took 20 minutes to put completely together. The padding at both ends is very soft and exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Frederick

product_meta.title: Orbelle Trading The Orbelle Gray Padded Toddler Bed
product_meta.description: The Orbelle tufted gray headboard and footboard, with crystal like inset buttons makes this magnificent toddler bed The center piece of your child's room. The frame of the toddler bed is made of sold wood. The fabric is an ultra soft micro-fiber polyester. The headboard and footboard are constructed of sold wood with a foam insert. Your little one will sleep soundly, in this richly rewarding design.. All tools are Included for easy assembly. Please use mild soap and water to care for the fabric
feature_bullets: The frame of the toddler bed is made of solid wood
The fabric is an ultra soft Micro-fiber polyester
All tools are Included for Easy assembly
